name: Work Group 8.2's Verification Badge
description: Created for Hicathon 2021 - WG 8.2 User Profile Verification Badge. Artwork by jetlag (@jetlagNFT), Animated by Tagachi Studio (@TagachiStudio). Working group members were jetlag, Tagachi Studio and Michael Lowe (@mjrlowe). Software used - Blender, Photoshop, After Effects, Audition.
